trans-unit.source: Represents a list control that encapsulates a group of radio button controls.
trans-unit.target: 表示封裝的選項按鈕控制項群組的清單控制項。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Specifying List Layout](#specifying_list_layout) - [Accessibility](#accessibility) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction The RadioButtonList control provides page developers with a single-selection radio button group that can be dynamically generated through data binding.
trans-unit.target: 本主題內容:-[簡介](#introduction) - [指定清單配置](#specifying_list_layout) - [協助工具](#accessibility) - [宣告式語法](#declarative_syntax) # # 簡介 RadioButtonList 控制項提供網頁開發人員可以透過資料繫結動態產生單一選取選項按鈕群組。

trans-unit.source: It contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection with members that correspond to individual items on the list.
trans-unit.target: 它包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>含清單上的個別項目所對應的成員集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine which item is selected, test the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedItem%2A> property of the list.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷哪一個項目已選取，請測試<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedItem%2A>清單的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Specifying List Layout You can specify how the list is rendered by setting the and properties.
trans-unit.target: # # 指定清單配置如何呈現所設定的清單，您可以指定和屬性。

trans-unit.source: For information about layout options, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 版面配置選項的相關資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>列舉型別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatDirection%2A> is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical`.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatDirection%2A>設`RepeatDirection.Vertical`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal` causes the control to render the list horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性設定為`RepeatDirection.Horizontal`會讓控制項以水平方式呈現清單。

trans-unit.source: Some <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A> settings do not allow horizontal layout.
trans-unit.target: 某些<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>設定不允許水平配置。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>列舉型別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 這個控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a RadioButtonList control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用驗證控制項來顯示 RadioButtonList 控制項中輸入的文字之前驗證使用者輸入。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護標準控制項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)， [How to︰ 保護對指令碼會利用 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和[驗證使用者輸入中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Accessibility For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: # # 有關如何設定這個控制項，使其產生標記，並符合協助工具標準，協助工具的資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ```              ```
trans-unit.target: # # 宣告式語法```              ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>的新執行個體使用這個建構函式

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance (in pixels) between the border and the contents of the table cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定框線表格儲存格內容之間的距離 （以像素為單位）。

trans-unit.source: This property applies only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to `RepeatLayout.Table`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性時，才適用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>屬性設定為`RepeatLayout.Table`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來控制的儲存格的內容與儲存格的框線之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of a cell.
trans-unit.target: 指定的填補量會加入至儲存格的四個邊。

trans-unit.source: It uses the height of the tallest cell in the table and the width of the widest cell in the table.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用資料表中最高的資料格的高度和寬度最寬的資料格在資料表中。

trans-unit.source: The resulting cell size is applied uniformly to all cells in the table.
trans-unit.target: 產生的儲存格大小會一致地套用至資料表中的所有資料格。

trans-unit.source: Individual cell sizes cannot be specified.
trans-unit.target: 個別儲存格大小不能指定。

trans-unit.source: The distance (in pixels) between the border and the contents of the table cell.
trans-unit.target: 框線的表格儲存格內容之間距離 （以像素為單位）。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為-1，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance (in pixels) between adjacent table cells.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定相鄰表格儲存格之間的距離 （以像素為單位）。

trans-unit.source: This property applies only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to `RepeatLayout.Table`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性時，才適用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>屬性設定為`RepeatLayout.Table`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to control the spacing between individual cells in the table.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來控制資料表中的個別儲存格之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: This property is applied both vertically and horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會套用垂直和水平。

trans-unit.source: The distance (in pixels) between adjacent table cells.
trans-unit.target: 相鄰表格儲存格之間的距離 （以像素為單位）。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為-1，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Creates a style object that is used internally by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> control to implement all style-related properties.
trans-unit.target: 建立樣式物件，它會在內部使用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref>控制項來實作所有樣式相關屬性。

trans-unit.source: The CreateControlStyle method is used primarily by control developers in custom control that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> class.
trans-unit.target: 主要由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>使用 CreateControlStyle 方法

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains the style properties of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref>包含控制項的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: Searches the current naming container for a server control with the specified ID and path offset.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋具有指定 ID 和路徑位移的伺服器控制項目前命名容器。

trans-unit.source: The FindControl method always returns the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: FindControl 方法一律會傳回<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The FindControl method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> class.
trans-unit.target: 主要由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>中使用 FindControl 方法

trans-unit.source: The FindControl method overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method of the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class.
trans-unit.target: FindControl 方法覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法的基底<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You should not override this version of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 您不應覆寫這個版本的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the control to find.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找的控制項識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The number of controls up the page control hierarchy needed to reach a naming container.
trans-unit.target: 向上到達命名容器所需頁面控制項階層架構的控制項數目。

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 目前<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the style of the specified item type at the specified index in the list control.
trans-unit.target: 擷取指定的項目類型，在清單控制項中指定索引處的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The GetItemStyle method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> class.
trans-unit.target: 主要由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>中使用 GetItemStyle 方法

trans-unit.source: The style attribute for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control applies to all list items that are contained by the control.
trans-unit.target: 樣式屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>控制項適用於所有清單項目包含的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control to examine or set the style attribute for the control and its list items.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>控制項來檢查或設定用於控制項和其清單項目之樣式屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An ordinal index that specifies the location of the item in the list control.
trans-unit.target: 序數索引，指定清單控制項中項目的位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, indicating that style attributes are not set on individual list items in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>指出樣式屬性表示未正確設定中的個別清單項目上<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> control contains a footer section.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref>控制項包含頁尾區段。

trans-unit.source: The HasFooter property is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> class.
trans-unit.target: HasFooter 屬性主要由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>中使用

trans-unit.source: Footers are not supported when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>.
trans-unit.target: 頁尾不是時，支援的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, indicating that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> does not contain a footer section.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>表示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref>不包含頁尾區段。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> control contains a heading section.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref>控制項包含頁首區段。

trans-unit.source: The HasHeader property is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> class.
trans-unit.target: HasHeader 屬性主要由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>中使用

trans-unit.source: Headers are not supported when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>.
trans-unit.target: 標頭不是時，支援的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, indicating that a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> control does not contain a heading section.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>表示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref>控制項不包含標題區段。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> control contains separators between items in the list.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref>控制項包含在清單中的項目之間的分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: The HasSeparators property is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> class.
trans-unit.target: HasSeparators 屬性主要由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>中使用

trans-unit.source: Separators are not supported when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>.
trans-unit.target: 分隔符號不是時，支援的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, indicating that a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> control does not contain separators.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>表示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref>控制項不包含分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: Processes the posted data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 處理張貼的資料<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The LoadPostData method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> class.
trans-unit.target: 主要由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>中使用 Selectionlist 方法

trans-unit.source: The LoadPostData method indicates whether the state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Selectionlist 方法會指出是否狀態<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>控制項已變更。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: In other words, it determines whether the selected list item in the control is the same as the last posted value.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，它會判斷在控制項中的選取的清單項目是否與最後張貼的值相同。

trans-unit.source: A user changing the selected item in the control changes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndex%2A> value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用者變更選取的項目中的控制項變更<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndex%2A>值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the same list item is selected in the control, or if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control is disabled, LoadPostData returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果在控制項中，選取相同的清單項目或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>控制項已停用，Selectionlist 傳回`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: When the LoadPostData method returns `true` for a control, the ASP.NET page framework invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method for the control.
trans-unit.target: Selectionlist 方法傳回時`true`控制項，ASP.NET 網頁架構會叫用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>控制項的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control, used to index the `postCollection`.
trans-unit.target: 使用之控制項的金鑰識別碼索引`postCollection`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref> that contains value information indexed by control identifiers.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含控制識別項進行索引的值資訊。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> is different from the last posting; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果狀態<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref>與最後張貼的不同，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the ASP.NET application that the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 通知 ASP.NET 應用程式的狀態<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref>控制項已變更。

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostDataChangedEvent method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> class.
trans-unit.target: 主要由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>中使用 RaisePostDataChangedEvent 方法

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET page framework calls the RaisePostDataChangedEvent method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.LoadPostData%2A> method indicates that the state of the list items have changed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 網頁架構呼叫 RaisePostDataChangedEvent 方法上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>負責控制何時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.LoadPostData%2A>方法表示已變更的清單項目狀態中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.LoadPostData%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostDataChangedEvent method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A> method to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: RaisePostDataChangedEvent 方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A>方法，以引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: Control developers can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A> method to perform custom processing when the user changes the selected item in the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項開發人員可以覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A>方法來執行自訂處理，當使用者變更控制項中選取的項目。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `RaisePostBackEvent` method can optionally perform validation before raising the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged> event for the control.
trans-unit.target: `RaisePostBackEvent`方法可以選擇性地執行之前引發驗證<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged>控制項事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: To validate a group of controls on the page when a list item within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control is selected, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.CausesValidation%2A> properties to `true`, and then specify the group of controls to be validated in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.ValidationGroup%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要驗證頁面時清單內的項目上的控制項群組<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>選取控制項，請將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.CausesValidation%2A>屬性`true`，然後指定要在驗證控制項群組的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.ValidationGroup%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.ValidationGroup%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.CausesValidation%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: Displays the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> control on the client.
trans-unit.target: 顯示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref>用戶端上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法使用主要由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: The Render method implementation for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo> object for the list, and calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo.RenderRepeater%2A> method, which in turn uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RenderItem%2A> method to render individual radio button list items.
trans-unit.target: Render 方法實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>控制初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo>物件清單，並呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo.RenderRepeater%2A>方法，後者接著會採用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RenderItem%2A>方法以呈現個別選項按鈕的清單項目。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RenderItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo.RenderRepeater%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that contains the output stream for rendering on the client.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> ，其中包含用戶端上呈現的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Renders a list item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 中的清單項目會呈現<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法使用主要由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.Render%2A> method implementation for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo> object for the list, and calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo.RenderRepeater%2A> method, which in turn uses the RenderItem method to render individual radio-button list items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.Render%2A>方法實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>控制初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo>物件清單，並呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo.RenderRepeater%2A>方法，依序使用的 RenderItem 方法來呈現清單項目個別的選項按鈕。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo.RenderRepeater%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.Render%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RenderItem method for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control ignores the `itemType` and `repeatInfo` parameters.
trans-unit.target: RenderItem 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>控制項會忽略`itemType`和`repeatInfo`參數。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: The `repeatIndex` parameter value is used to select the radio button list item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection, and the selected list item is rendered to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: `repeatIndex`參數值會用來選取選項按鈕清單項目中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>集合，並選取的清單項目呈現至輸出資料流。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An ordinal index that specifies the location of the item in the list control.
trans-unit.target: 序數索引，指定清單控制項中項目的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo"></xref> that represents the information used to render the item in the list.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo"> </xref> ，代表用來呈現清單中的項目資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> ，代表要呈現 HTML 內容的用戶端上的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control is rendered if the data source has no data or if the control is not data-bound.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出如果資料來源沒有資料或控制項不是資料繫結，是否要呈現控制項。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is rendered if the data source has no data or if the control is not data-bound; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果呈現控制項，如果資料來源沒有資料，或控制項不是資料繫結。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of columns to display in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要顯示的資料行數目<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>, you can use this property to specify the number of columns that display items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>，您可以使用這個屬性來指定顯示項目中的資料行數目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control displays all items in the list in a single column.
trans-unit.target: 如果未設定這個屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>控制項會顯示在單一資料行的清單中的所有項目。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: The number of columns to display in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在中顯示的資料行數目<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns is set to a negative value.
trans-unit.target: 資料行數目是設定為負數值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the direction in which the radio buttons within the group are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在其中顯示群組中的選項按鈕的方向。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the display direction of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用此屬性指定的顯示方向<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The number of columns that are displayed is always determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 所顯示的資料行的數目一律由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical` and if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>, the first column is filled from top to bottom, then the next column, and so on until all items are rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性設定為`RepeatDirection.Vertical`如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>，從上到下，再下一個資料行，依此類推直到所有的項目會呈現填滿第一個資料行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns%2A> is set to 3, the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control are displayed in three columns.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns%2A>設為 [3] 的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>控制會顯示在三個資料行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: A nine-item list would appear as follows.
trans-unit.target: 九項目清單會出現，如下所示。

trans-unit.source: |||| |-|-|-| |1|4|7| |2|5|8| |3|6|9| If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal` and if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>, the items in the list are displayed in rows loaded left to right, then top to bottom, until all items are rendered.
trans-unit.target: |||| |-|-|-| |&1; |&4; |&7; | |&2; |&5; |&8; | |&3; |&6; |&9; | 如果這個屬性設定為`RepeatDirection.Horizontal`如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>、 在清單中的項目會顯示在資料列載入左到右，然後上由上至下，直到所有的項目會呈現。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns%2A> is set to 3, the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control are displayed in rows of three items.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns%2A>設為 [3] 的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>控制項顯示資料列的三個項目。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: A nine-item list would appear as follows.
trans-unit.target: 九項目清單會出現，如下所示。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Vertical" name="Vertical" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Vertical" name="Vertical" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The display direction of the list is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 清單的顯示方向不是其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of list items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得清單中的項目數目<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The RepeatedItemCount property is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> class.
trans-unit.target: RepeatedItemCount 屬性主要由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>中使用

trans-unit.source: If there are no items set in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control, the RepeatedItemCount property is zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何項目將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>控制 RepeatedItemCount 屬性是零。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: If there are items set in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control, the RepeatedItemCount property is the same as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection.Count%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有設定項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>控制 RepeatedItemCount 屬性是與相同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection.Count%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection.Count%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the list control.
trans-unit.target: 清單控制項中的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the list will be rendered by using a <xref uid="langword_csharp_table" name="table" href=""></xref> element, a <xref uid="langword_csharp_ul" name="ul" href=""></xref> element, an <xref uid="langword_csharp_ol" name="ol" href=""></xref> element, or a <xref uid="langword_csharp_span" name="span" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定是否使用呈現清單<xref uid="langword_csharp_table" name="table" href=""></xref>項目， <xref uid="langword_csharp_ul" name="ul" href=""> </xref>項目， <xref uid="langword_csharp_ol" name="ol" href=""> </xref>項目，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_span" name="span" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: For information about the available options, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 可用選項的相關資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>列舉型別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Two options are new as of ASP.NET 4: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 兩個選項是新的 ASP.NET 4︰<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>

trans-unit.source: Some RepeatLayout settings do not allow horizontal layout.
trans-unit.target: 某些 RepeatLayout 設定不允許水平配置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>列舉型別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether the list will be rendered by using a <xref uid="langword_csharp_table" name="table" href=""></xref> element, a <xref uid="langword_csharp_ul" name="ul" href=""></xref> element, an <xref uid="langword_csharp_ol" name="ol" href=""></xref> element, or a <xref uid="langword_csharp_span" name="span" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 值，指定是否使用呈現清單<xref uid="langword_csharp_table" name="table" href=""></xref>項目， <xref uid="langword_csharp_ul" name="ul" href=""> </xref>項目， <xref uid="langword_csharp_ol" name="ol" href=""> </xref>項目，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_span" name="span" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The radio button layout is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 選項按鈕的配置不是其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Processes posted data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 處理張貼資料<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to process posted data for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您應該使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法來處理張貼的資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法是明確介面成員實作。</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control, used to index the `postCollection`.
trans-unit.target: 使用之控制項的金鑰識別碼索引`postCollection`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref> that contains value information indexed by control identifiers.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含控制識別項進行索引的值資訊。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the server control's state changed as a result of the postback; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果伺服器控制項的狀態因回傳而變更否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Raised when posted data for a control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的張貼的資料變更時引發。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to raise an event when the posted data for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control changes.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您應該使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法來引發事件時的張貼的資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>控制的變更。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent method is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent 方法是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the style of the specified item type at the specified index in the list control.
trans-unit.target: 擷取指定的項目類型，在清單控制項中指定索引處的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.GetItemStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to retrieve the style of an item in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您應該使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.GetItemStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法來擷取中的項目樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.GetItemStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The IRepeatInfoUser.GetItemStyle method is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: IRepeatInfoUser.GetItemStyle 方法是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser>介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An ordinal index that specifies the location of the item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 序數索引，在清單中指定項目的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that represents the style of the specified item type at the specified index in the list control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref>表示指定的項目類型，在清單控制項中指定索引處的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the list control contains a footer section.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否在清單控制項包含頁尾區段。

trans-unit.source: This property is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the list control contains a footer section; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果清單控制項包含頁尾區段，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the list control contains a heading section.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示清單控制項是否包含標題區段。

trans-unit.source: This property is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> instance is cast to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser>介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the list control contains a header section; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果清單控制項包含頁首區段，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the list control contains a separator between items in the list.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示清單控制項是否包含在清單中的項目之間的分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: This property is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser>介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the list control contains has separators; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果清單控制項包含，具有分隔符號。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Renders an item in the list with the specified information.
trans-unit.target: 呈現具有指定資訊清單中的項目。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RenderItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to render items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您應該使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RenderItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法來呈現項目中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RenderItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: IRepeatInfoUser.RenderItem 方法是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser>介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An ordinal index that specifies the location of the item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 序數索引，在清單中指定項目的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo"></xref> that represents the information used to render the item in the list.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo"> </xref> ，代表用來呈現清單中的項目資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> ，代表要呈現 HTML 內容的用戶端上的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the list control.
trans-unit.target: 取得清單控制項中的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: This property is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> instance is cast to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser>介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the control.
trans-unit.target: 在控制項中的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text alignment for the radio buttons within the group.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定群組中選項按鈕的文字對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify whether the text associated with the radio buttons appears on the left or right.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來指定是否使用選項按鈕相關聯的文字會出現在左邊或右邊。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `TextAlign.Right`, the text is displayed to the right of the radio button.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性設定為`TextAlign.Right`，右邊的選項按鈕的顯示文字。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `TextAlign.Left`, the text is displayed to the left of the radio button.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性設定為`TextAlign.Left`，文字就會顯示選項按鈕的左方。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextAlign"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextAlign"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Right" name="Right" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Right" name="Right" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The label text alignment associated with the radio buttons is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextAlign"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 選項按鈕相關聯的標籤文字對齊方式不是其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextAlign"></xref>值。
